page.title: 07CHRISTIAN MALFORD VILLAGE
page.content: CHRISTIAN MALFORD HAS ONE SHOP ,ONE GARAGE,AND TWO PUBS,THE RISING SUN AND THE MERMAID.MR.FARBROTHER OWNS THE SHOP AND HE SELLS ALL SORTS OF THINGS,BREAD,SWEETS,MEAT,POTATOES,VEGE TABLES,DOG FOOD,TINS OF FOOD,GAMES,STAMPS,WRITING PAPER.WHEN WE LOOKED AT THE HOUSES NEAR THE SCHOOL MOST OF THEM WERE MADE OF STONE WITH TILES ON THE ROOF.NEARLY ALL OF THEM HAD HEDGES AND CHIMNEYS.TERE WERE LOTS OF DIFFERENT KINDS OF WINDOWS AND DOORS.THE SCHOOL IS MADE OF BRICKS AND SLATES AND IT WAS BUILT IN 1852 BUT THE INFANTS IS MUCH NEWER.THERE IS ARAILWAY LINE BUT THE TRAINS DON'T STOP HERE.THERE ARE LOTS OF NEW THINGS HERE THAT AREN'T ON THE OLD MAP,LIKE LIME TREES,THE POST OFFICE,THE RECTORY.THE REC.,THE NURSERIES.
